QuestData.Title: Follow the Breadcrumbs
QuestData.Description: VERY WELL, I AM HEREBY WARNING YOU THAT YOU WILL FIND NOTHING UP ON THE RIDGE.$B$BDO NOT FOLLOW THE TRAIL OF SPARE PARTS THAT LEAD TO TOSHLEY'S STATION! YOU WILL NOT FIND TOSHLEY, NOR ANY OTHER GNOME THERE.
QuestData.LogDescription: Follow the trail of spare parts up the ramp to the Razor Ridge. Speak with Toshley at Toshley's Station in the Blade's Edge Mountains.
QuestData.RewardText: Alright, you want to make yourself useful? Good, I have just the thing that you can prove yourself with.$B$BI think you'll like it.
